definition: prefecture level city in east Henan 河南
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Zhoukou prefecture level city in east Henan 河南
Zhoukoudian prehistoric site in Fangshan district 房山區|房山区[Fang2 shan1 qu1], Beijing
Zhoukou prefecture in Henan

sentences.english: The fossil (skull) of "Peking Man" (LPP) discovered in Zhoukoudian, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京猿人頭骨化石在周口店發現。

sentences.english: The Caveman site discovered in the Beijing Zhoukoudian area dates back about 30,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 而北京周口店的山頂洞人遺址，距今約三萬年。

sentences.english: Zhoukoudian is a village of Fangshan County, about 50km from Beijing .
sentences.chinese: 周口店是北京房山縣的一個鎮，距北京城約50公里。

sentences.english: The fossils of "Shandingdong Man" (UPP) discovered in Zhoukoudian.
sentences.chinese: 山頂洞人頭骨化石在周口店發現。

sentences.english: Paleozoic buried hills of NW, NE trending developes well in Zhoukou depression.
sentences.chinese: 周口坳陷主要發育北西和北東向的古生界潛山。

sentences.english: In Zhoukou, Henan Province, dozens of trees were uprooted and ripped apart by the strong storms.
sentences.chinese: 河南周口也遭遇特大冰雹，樹木被連根拔起。

sentences.english: Zhoukou Yue Opera and traditional extase have been identified as a national intangible cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 周口越調和道情戲被確定爲國家非物質文化遺產。

sentences.english: The prototype of Zhoukou Cretaceous basin should be of foredeep basin.
sentences.chinese: 白堊紀周口盆地的盆地原型應是山前凹陷盆地。
